long_description: . Author: Jason Haas. Softcover; 224 pages; color photographs and maps. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2009. Section overview and individual climb maps help orient you to the targeted climb; photographs with highlighted routes chart your ascent. Guide provides all essential information and then some: difficulty rating, access, seasonal closures and GPS coordinates. Guide is organized by parking area.
short_description: Climbing Boulder's Flatirons offers climbers a full-color exploration of the unique rock formations outside of Boulder, Colorado.
